segments.text: I'm so happy to see those kids being so mischievous and having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely absorbed in drying that plate, and she doesn't even notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the floor is getting all wet and slippery, but they don't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it looks like he's having the time of his life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, but he seems to be doing just fine up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, and she looks so excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside the window, and it looks so calm and peaceful, like a perfect day for some mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just so full of joy and happiness, it's like a snapshot of a perfect childhood memory.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could join in on the fun, but for now, I'll just sit back and enjoy the show.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are just having so much fun, and it's making me so happy to watch them.
segments.speaker: PAR
